title: ¿Qué revela la protesta ‘Sin Reyes’? Miles se manifiestan contra las políticas de Trump
shortDescription: Más de 2,500 protestas ‘No Kings’ unieron a millones el 18 de octubre en defensa de la democracia, los derechos y la libertad ante el poder presidencial.

title: FBI investigates hunting stand with sight line of Air Force One, Trump
shortDescription: The FBI launched an investigation into a hunting stand with a sight line of where President Donald Trump exits Air Force One in Palm Beach, Florida.

title: Trump slams Colombia's president after he accuses US of murder
shortDescription: The U.S. has launched military strikes on seven alleged drug trafficking vessels since September, killing at least 32.

title: Zelenskyy says Trump needs to apply 'more pressure' with Putin
shortDescription: Ukraine's president left DC without the missiles he hoped for, but he said he's 'ready' to attend Trump's proposed U.S.-Russia summit in Budapest.

title: Trump shares videos of himself wearing a crown after 'No Kings' protests
shortDescription: In one video the president shared on social media, Trump wears a crown and flies a fighter jet with "King Trump" written on it.

title: For this senator, Trump's special ed layoffs are personal
shortDescription: Sen. Maggie Hassan, whose son has cerebral palsy, has long been a vocal supporter of special ed. Trump's new layoffs are a "real blow," she said.

title: CA voters split on Proposition 50
shortDescription: A previous version of the video included a misspelled name.

title: Trump wants George Santos to have a 'great life' after prison
shortDescription: Former Rep. George Santos headed to federal prison for fraud in July. Then President Trump commuted his sentence.

title: Trump says Gaza war is over as Hamas, Israel swap hostages and prisoners
shortDescription: Hamas freed the last living Israeli hostages on Monday (October 13) under a ceasefire deal, a big step towards ending two years of ruinous war in Gaza as U.S. President Donald Trump addressed Israel's parliament, urging it to turn military success into peace.

title: Protesters rally worldwide against Trump
shortDescription: Protesters in Berlin, London and Madrid joined “No Kings” rallies opposing President Donald Trump’s policies and promoting democratic values.

title: New York GOP disbands young Republicans chapter over racist texts
shortDescription: The executive committee of the New York GOP State Committee voted to suspend the state’s young Republican chapter.

title: Day 18 of the government shutdown. Can Trump and Congress make deal?
shortDescription: The Senate is scheduled to reconvene on Oct. 20 at 3 p.m. ET. The Senate will then vote on a measure to end the shutdown around 5:30 p.m. ET.

title: Why is Trump targeting Venezuela for military action?
shortDescription: The United States has bombed six ships near Venezuela President Donald Trump greenlit the CIA to operate inside the country. Why is this happening?

title: Gateway tunnel: Trump vows to ‘end’ largest US infrastructure project
shortDescription: The $16 billion project has bipartisan support in New Jersey and New York amid a closely watched governor's race.

title: Trump signs order to impose 25% tariffs on some trucks
shortDescription: Trump said the move was made to protect manufacturers from "unfair outside competition."

title: Trump: 'He doesn't want to f--- around with the United States.'
shortDescription: President Trump made a statement to Venezuela's Nicolás Maduro when answering why the U.S. was offered a stake in Venezuela's natural resources.

title: Revisit George Santos's political career as Trump commutes sentence
shortDescription: President Trump commuted former U.S. Rep. George Santos’ seven-year prison sentence, releasing him from jail on Oct. 17. Revisit his political career in photos.

title: Why was ex Congressman George Santos in prison?
shortDescription: Santos, who was expelled from Congress in 2023, was sent to federal prison in July 2025 but what were the charges?
